MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 and G69 postcode areas of Stepps and Muirhead. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:53pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:37pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
